mapper.insert: INSERT INTO like_list VALUES('like' || like_seq.nextval, #{originId}, sysdate, #{mId})
INSERT INTO meet_parti(meetp_id, m_id, meet_id, my_fund) VALUES('meetp' || meetp_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{meetId}, #{myFund})
INSERT INTO wallet_history VALUES ('wallet' || wallet_seq.nextval, #{mId}, #{walletMoney}, #{walletType}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT u.meet_title, p.m_id, u.meet_id, u.total_day, p.success, p.achiv, u.meet_pic FROM meet_un u JOIN meet_parti p ON (u.meet_id = p.meet_id) WHERE p.m_id=#{mId}
mapper.update: UPDATE meet_parti SET achiv=#{achiv}, success = success + 1 WHERE meetp_id = #{meetpId}
